author: ssantpur
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a maximum timing threshold on the jet timing that enables the addition of the delayed jet triggers in the parking stream and the addition of dedicated satellite or beam halo triggers in the prompt stream.

#### PR validation:

Validated that this addition doesn't change the rate of the existing delayed jet triggers

Please backport this PR to the appropriate CMS release to enable the addition of these new triggers in the Confdb menu. @missirol Let me know if this looks ok to you.
title: Add upper cut on jet time to HLTJetTimingFilter
